document.full_text: a controversial natural gas production technique, which is key to a century of u.s. domestic supply, is causing contamination of drinking water, a report released by the national academy of sciences said on monday.
document.title: report links fracking to tainted drinking water
lines_and_colors: a controversial natural gas production technique, which is key to a century of u.s. domestic supply, is causing contamination of drinking water, a report released by the national academy of sciences said on monday.
